name: Sheikh Ahmed Ali
subject: Islamic Studies
background: Sheikh Ahmed Ali has been teaching Islamic Studies for over 15 years and is known for his deep knowledge of Islamic jurisprudence (Fiqh) and Quranic exegesis (Tafsir). He holds a degree from Al-Azhar University and has conducted many workshops on Islamic values.

name: Umm Ibrahim
subject: Arabic Language
background: Umm Ibrahim has been teaching Arabic for a decade. She has a passion for teaching classical Arabic and understanding the nuances of the language in relation to Islamic texts. She holds a Master's degree in Arabic from the University of Medina.

name: Dr. Khalid Al-Siddiq
subject: History of Islam
background: Dr. Khalid Al-Siddiq has been an expert in the history of Islam, with a focus on the early years of the Muslim community. He has authored several books on Islamic history and has a Ph.D. in Islamic History from the University of Cairo.
